donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME

outputs.output_descr:
In collaboration with CSOD, support implementation of Global Strategy on Strengthening Civil Society and Civic Engagement. Guidance note on Nurturing Social Accountability. Finalise and publish primer on civil society legal framework. In collaboration with CSOD high-profile publication showcasing UNDP's work in civic engagement and with civil society.  OGC will also collaborate with the Governance Assessment Team and the CSOD to produce a publication in the 'users' guide' series on measuring and assessing civil society. Support CSOD in producing occasional paper with civil society.
Analytical work with international IDEA and other partners (internal and external)
Collaborate with the World Bank and other UN agencies to achieve the recommendations of the XIth Inter-agency UN Roundtable on C4D. Advance C4D agenda in international forums, including in the Global Forum on Freedom of Expression to be held in Norway in June 2009. In collaboration with DG advisors, ensure C4D issues are appropriately included within the developing service delivery platform on E-governance and Access to Information.
Completion of C4E audits pilots in Ghana, Nepal and Laos. Preparation and dissemination of country and global synthesis reports.

donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
outputs.output_descr: Global Programme Capacity Development for Democratic Governance: Assessements and Measurements
UNDP-IDASA (EC funded) study of Governance Indicators in Africa - to analyze the use of governance indicators and evidence in Ghana, Mozambique and Rwanda.
Operational and office running costs including office rental cost, core staff salaries, outreach activities, Director's travel budget.

The focus of the Learning and Capacity Team of the OGC is global. Training services will be delivered to UNDP staff at global and regional events. Advisory services will delivered primarily to other DG advisors working on learning events, while the Fellowship programme will remain primarily global but may be piloted on regional level in 2008. Knowledge products will also be disseminated to the wider DG community globally.

project_descr: Budget for Oslo Governance Centre's projects in 2007
